epic.title: Messaging and Communication
epic.description: Implement core real-time text messaging and video calling capabilities for the application, enabling one-to-one and group communication across devices.

stories.title: Implement Real-Time Text Messaging
stories.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups, supporting delivery within 1 second and group chats with at least 50 participants.
acceptanceCriteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Messages appear in correct chronological order across all devices
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the user
System supports group chats with at least 50 participants

tasks.title: Design messaging UI/UX for individual and group chats
tasks.description: Create intuitive chat interfaces for users, including message list, input box, and unread indicators.

tasks.title: Develop WebSocket-based message delivery system
tasks.description: Implement backend services for real-time text message transmission with latency under 1 second.

tasks.title: Implement group chat support up to 50 participants
tasks.description: Add backend and UI features to enable large group messaging with performance optimization.

tasks.title: Integrate unread message indicators
tasks.description: Provide visual cues for unread messages in chats.

stories.title: Implement Video Calling
stories.description: Allow users to initiate and participate in one-to-one and group video calls in real time, supporting adaptive quality and encryption.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can start and receive video calls from their contact list
Video and audio streams have less than 300ms latency under normal conditions
Support for at least 4 participants in a group video call
Call quality automatically adjusts based on network conditions

tasks.title: Design video calling UI/UX for individual and group calls
tasks.description: Create interfaces for initiating, joining, and managing video calls.

tasks.title: Integrate WebRTC for real-time video and audio streaming
tasks.description: Implement backend and frontend code for sending and receiving encrypted video/audio streams.

tasks.title: Implement group video calls (up to 4 participants)
tasks.description: Enable multi-party video conferencing with network optimization and quality adaptation.

tasks.title: Add end-to-end encryption for calls
tasks.description: Ensure privacy and security for video and audio data over the network.

notes: Assumed requirement includes both one-to-one and group communication for text and video. Dependencies such as user authentication and real-time server infrastructure are handled outside the scope of these stories. Performance constraints (latency and uptime) are included as acceptance criteria where applicable.
